derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English me(o)du, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch mee and German Met, from an Indo-European root shared by Sanskrit madhu 'sweet drink, honey' and Greek methu 'wine'
Old English mǣd, of Germanic origin; related to mow
